name: Fancy Slingshot VR
description: Destroy the bottle in a beautiful coffee shop. Twenty different level waiting their challenger. Destroy them all through the slingshot in your hand! All the bottle in the games can be Destroy . Turn around to change mode between Challenge and practice.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win7 Win8 Win10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX970 Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: $1, is not expensive price to bought this simple game of fun. The level is a challenge to me, I only got to level 5 in my first try. When i tried it again and again, until the 12th, i got to the final stage, at which i must say the last level is too difficult to pass. The total game time maybe is not long for an expert. But gaining patience to challenge, we will be able to clear levels too.
